org.joyrest.context

Class NonDiConfigurer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.joyrest.context.AbstractConfigurer<Object>
      • org.joyrest.context.NonDiConfigurer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configurer<Object>

    public abstract class NonDiConfigurer
extends AbstractConfigurer<Object>
    Abstract Configurer which is mainly used for an implementation of a new configurer that is not based on any Dependency Injection Framework. Abstract class as a helper for initialization an ApplicationContext.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.joyrest.context.AbstractConfigurer

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public abstract ApplicationContext initialize()
        Method in which is application context of NonDiConfigurer initialized. After a registering all useful beans is needed to call the method AbstractConfigurer.initializeContext() that finishes the creation of the application context.
        Returns:
        application context with all registered beans
